verses.text: \w While|strong="H3588"\w* \w Ezra|strong="H5830"\w* \w prayed|strong="H6419"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w made|strong="H7235"\w* \w this|strong="H3588"\w* \w confession|strong="H3034"\w*, \w weeping|strong="H1058"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w falling|strong="H5307"\w* \w facedown|strong="H6440"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* God, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w large|strong="H7227"\w* \w assembly|strong="H6951"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w*—\w men|strong="H3206"\w*, women, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w children|strong="H3206"\w*—\w gathered|strong="H6908"\w* \w around|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w wept|strong="H1058"\w* \w bitterly|strong="H1058"\w* \w as|strong="H3588"\w* \w well|strong="H3966"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H6030"\w* \w Shecaniah|strong="H7935"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jehiel|strong="H3171"\w*, \w an|strong="H3426"\w* Elamite, \w said|strong="H6030"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w Ezra|strong="H5830"\w*: “\w We|strong="H6258"\w* \w have|strong="H3426"\w* \w been|strong="H4603"\w* \w unfaithful|strong="H4603"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w our|strong="H5921"\w* God \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w marrying|strong="H3427"\w* \w foreign|strong="H5237"\w* women \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* land, \w yet|strong="H6258"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w spite|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w*, \w there|strong="H3426"\w* \w is|strong="H3426"\w* \w hope|strong="H4723"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w So|strong="H6213"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w* \w let|strong="H6258"\w* \w us|strong="H6213"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* before \w our|strong="H3605"\w* God \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w send|strong="H3318"\w* \w away|strong="H3318"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* foreign wives \w and|strong="H6213"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w children|strong="H3205"\w*, according \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w* \w of|strong="H3205"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* lord \w and|strong="H6213"\w* \w of|strong="H3205"\w* \w those|strong="H1992"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w tremble|strong="H2730"\w* \w at|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w command|strong="H4687"\w* \w of|strong="H3205"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* God. \w Let|strong="H6258"\w* \w it|strong="H6213"\w* \w be|strong="H1285"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* according \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Law|strong="H8451"\w*.

\w Get|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w this|strong="H6213"\w* \w matter|strong="H1697"\w* \w is|strong="H1697"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w responsibility|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H1697"\w* \w support|strong="H2388"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*. \w Be|strong="H1697"\w* \w strong|strong="H2388"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w take|strong="H2388"\w* \w action|strong="H6213"\w*!”

\w So|strong="H6213"\w* \w Ezra|strong="H5830"\w* \w got|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w leading|strong="H8269"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w take|strong="H6213"\w* \w an|strong="H6213"\w* \w oath|strong="H7650"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w what|strong="H1697"\w* \w had|strong="H3478"\w* \w been|strong="H3605"\w* \w said|strong="H1697"\w*. \w And|strong="H6965"\w* \w they|strong="H6213"\w* \w took|strong="H7650"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w oath|strong="H7650"\w*. The People’s Confession of Sin

\w Then|strong="H6965"\w* \w Ezra|strong="H5830"\w* withdrew \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w walked|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w chamber|strong="H3957"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jehohanan|strong="H3076"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Eliashib. \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w while|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* stayed \f + \fr 10:6 \ft Or went\f* \w there|strong="H8033"\w*, \w he|strong="H3588"\w* ate \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w food|strong="H3899"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w drank|strong="H8354"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H1004"\w* mourning \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w unfaithfulness|strong="H4604"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w exiles|strong="H1473"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w proclamation|strong="H6963"\w* \w was|strong="H3063"\w* issued \w throughout|strong="H3605"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w exiles|strong="H1473"\w* should \w gather|strong="H6908"\w* \w at|strong="H6908"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

\w Whoever|strong="H3605"\w* \w failed|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H3117"\w* appear within \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w would|strong="H3605"\w* forfeit \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w property|strong="H7399"\w*, according \w to|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w leaders|strong="H8269"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w elders|strong="H2205"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w would|strong="H3605"\w* \w himself|strong="H1931"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* expelled \w from|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w assembly|strong="H6951"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w exiles|strong="H1473"\w*.

\w So|strong="H1697"\w* \w within|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w men|strong="H5971"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w* \w assembled|strong="H6908"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w twentieth|strong="H6242"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w ninth|strong="H8671"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w square|strong="H7339"\w* \w at|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* God, \w trembling|strong="H7460"\w* \w regarding|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H1931"\w* \w matter|strong="H1697"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* heavy \w rain|strong="H1653"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H6965"\w* \w Ezra|strong="H5830"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w stood|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* said \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*, “\w You|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H3478"\w* \w been|strong="H4603"\w* \w unfaithful|strong="H4603"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w marrying|strong="H3427"\w* \w foreign|strong="H5237"\w* women, \w adding|strong="H3254"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* guilt \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H6258"\w*, \w therefore|strong="H6258"\w*, \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w confession|strong="H8426"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* fathers, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w His|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w*. Separate \w yourselves|strong="H3068"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* land \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w foreign|strong="H5237"\w* wives.”

\w And|strong="H6030"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w assembly|strong="H6951"\w* \w responded|strong="H6030"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w loud|strong="H1419"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*: “\w Truly|strong="H6213"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* must \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w say|strong="H6963"\w*!

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w there|strong="H2088"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w here|strong="H2088"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w rainy|strong="H1653"\w* \w season|strong="H6256"\w*. \w We|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w able|strong="H3581"\w* \w to|strong="H6256"\w* \w stay|strong="H5975"\w* \w out|strong="H2351"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w open|strong="H2351"\w*. \w Nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w work|strong="H4399"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w one|strong="H2088"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H5971"\w* \w transgressed|strong="H6586"\w* \w greatly|strong="H7227"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w matter|strong="H1697"\w*.

\w Let|strong="H4994"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* \w leaders|strong="H8269"\w* \w represent|strong="H5975"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w assembly|strong="H6951"\w*. \w Then|strong="H2088"\w* \w let|strong="H4994"\w* \w everyone|strong="H3605"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* \w towns|strong="H5892"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w has|strong="H1697"\w* \w married|strong="H3427"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w foreign|strong="H5237"\w* \w woman|strong="H5237"\w* \w come|strong="H7725"\w* \w at|strong="H3427"\w* \w an|strong="H4480"\w* \w appointed|strong="H5975"\w* \w time|strong="H6256"\w*, \w together|strong="H5973"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w judges|strong="H8199"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w each|strong="H3605"\w* \w town|strong="H5892"\w*, \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w fierce|strong="H2740"\w* \w anger|strong="H2740"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* God \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w matter|strong="H1697"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w turned|strong="H7725"\w* \w away|strong="H7725"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w us|strong="H4994"\w*.”

(Only \w Jonathan|strong="H3129"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Asahel|strong="H6214"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jahzeiah|strong="H3167"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Tikvah|strong="H8616"\w*, supported \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w Meshullam|strong="H4918"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Shabbethai|strong="H7678"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Levite|strong="H3881"\w*, \w opposed|strong="H5975"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* plan.)

\w So|strong="H3651"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w exiles|strong="H1473"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w proposed|strong="H1697"\w*. \w Ezra|strong="H5830"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* selected \w men|strong="H1121"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w family|strong="H1004"\w* \w heads|strong="H7218"\w*, \w each|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w them|strong="H6213"\w* identified \w by|strong="H3117"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, \w to|strong="H6213"\w* represent \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w families|strong="H1004"\w*. \w On|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w first|strong="H1121"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w tenth|strong="H6224"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* launched \w the|strong="H3605"\w* investigation,

\w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w by|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w had|strong="H3427"\w* dealt \w with|strong="H3427"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w men|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w had|strong="H3427"\w* \w married|strong="H3427"\w* \w foreign|strong="H5237"\w* women. Those Guilty of Intermarriage

\w Among|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H4672"\w* \w descendants|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H4672"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w who|strong="H3548"\w* \w had|strong="H3548"\w* \w married|strong="H3427"\w* \w foreign|strong="H5237"\w* women \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* these \w descendants|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jeshua|strong="H3442"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jozadak|strong="H3136"\w* \f + \fr 10:18 \ft Jozadak is a variant of Jehozadak; see 1 Chronicles 6:14.\f* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H4672"\w* \w brothers|strong="H1121"\w*: Maaseiah, Eliezer, Jarib, and Gedaliah.
They pledged to send their wives away, and for their guilt they presented a ram from the flock as a guilt offering.
\w From|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w descendants|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Immer: Hanani and Zebadiah.
\w From|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H8098"\w* \w descendants|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Harim|strong="H2766"\w*: Maaseiah, Elijah, Shemaiah, Jehiel, and Uzziah.
\w From|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3458"\w* \w descendants|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Pashhur|strong="H6583"\w*: Elioenai, Maaseiah, Ishmael, Nethanel, Jozabad, and Elasah.
\w Among|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*: Jozabad, Shimei, Kelaiah (that is, Kelita), Pethahiah, Judah, and Eliezer.

\w From|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w singers|strong="H7891"\w*: Eliashib. \w From|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w gatekeepers|strong="H7778"\w*: Shallum, Telem, and Uri.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w among|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H1141"\w* other \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w*, \w from|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H1141"\w* \w descendants|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Parosh|strong="H6551"\w*: Ramiah, Izziah, Malchijah, Mijamin, Eleazar, Malchijah,\f + \fr 10:25 \ft Hebrew; LXX Hashabiah\f* and Benaiah.
\w From|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w descendants|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Elam|strong="H5867"\w*: Mattaniah, Zechariah, Jehiel, Abdi, Jeremoth, and Elijah.
\w From|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w descendants|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Zattu|strong="H2240"\w*: Elioenai, Eliashib, Mattaniah, Jeremoth, Zabad, and Aziza.
\w From|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3076"\w* \w descendants|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Bebai: Jehohanan, Hananiah, Zabbai, and Athlai.
\w From|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w descendants|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Bani|strong="H1137"\w*: Meshullam, Malluch, Adaiah, Jashub, Sheal, and Jeremoth.

\w From|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1141"\w* \w descendants|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Pahath-moab|strong="H6355"\w*: Adna, Chelal, Benaiah, Maaseiah, Mattaniah, Bezalel, Binnui, and Manasseh.
\w From|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H8098"\w* \w descendants|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Harim|strong="H2766"\w*: Eliezer, Isshijah, Malchijah, Shemaiah, Shimeon,
Benjamin, Malluch, and Shemariah.

\w From|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w descendants|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Hashum|strong="H2828"\w*: Mattenai, Mattattah, Zabad, Eliphelet, Jeremai, Manasseh, and Shimei.
\w From|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w descendants|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Bani|strong="H1137"\w*: Maadai, Amram, Uel,
Benaiah, Bedeiah, Cheluhi,
Vaniah, Meremoth, Eliashib,
Mattaniah, Mattenai, and Jaasu.

\w From|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w descendants|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Binnui|strong="H1131"\w*: Shimei,\f + \fr 10:38 \ft See LXX; Hebrew And Bani, and Binnui, (and) Shimei,\f*
Shelemiah, Nathan, Adaiah,
Machnadebai, Shashai, Sharai,
Azarel, Shelemiah, Shemariah,
Shallum, Amariah, and Joseph.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w from|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1141"\w* \w descendants|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Nebo|strong="H5015"\w*: Jeiel, Mattithiah, Zabad, Zebina, Jaddai, Joel, and Benaiah.

\w All|strong="H3605"\w* \w these|strong="H1992"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w* \w had|strong="H3426"\w* \w married|strong="H5375"\w* \w foreign|strong="H5237"\w* \w women|strong="H1992"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w some|strong="H1992"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w* \w had|strong="H3426"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w by|strong="H3605"\w* \w these|strong="H1992"\w* wives.\f + \fr 10:44 \ft Or and they sent them away with their children\f*
